Commentary.ab: gaēϑiiāca] sec. cod. 6, 8, 110, 672, 2030, 2106, 4045, 4162, 4200, 4210; Kellens ⁺gaēϑiiāca; Geldner irr. gaēϑiiāica (sec. other cod.).

Parallels.ab: yazamaide vīspā̊ vaŋhauuō yazamaide vīspā̊ vaŋᵛhīš ~ Y8.4, Y65.12, Y65.13 vaŋhuuasca vaŋᵛhīšca; ~ Y39.3, VrS65.47 yazamaidē vaŋhūšcā. īt̰ vaŋᵛhīšcā īt̰.

vīspā̊ maińiiauuaca yazata gaēϑiiāca yōi vaŋhuδā̊ŋhō aṣ̌auuanō; ~ Y1.20, Y3.25, Y4.26, Y7.26, Y14.3, Y17.19, Y22.30, Y24.31, Y66.25, VrS78.37, VrS79.26, VrS82.25 vīspaēibiiō vaŋhuδā̊biiō yazataēbiiō maińiiaōibiiascā gaēϑiiaēibiiascā; ~ Y71.5 vīspaēca aṣ̌auuanō maińiiauuaca yazata gaēϑiiāca yazamaide
maińiiauuaca yazata gaēϑiiāca ~ Yt19.22 maińiiauanąm yazatanąm gaēiϑiianąmca.
maińiiauuaca ... gaēϑiiāca ~ Y3.4, Y7.5, maińiiauuanąm gaēϑiianąm ~ Y19.20, Y20.4 maińiiaōmca gaēϑīmca.
